description: Juicy pork carnitas are the perfect centrepiece dish for taco night.
keywords: Taco,Orange,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pork,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork Carnitas Tacos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush oil all over the pork shoulder and sear on all sides in a pan on medium high heat.
Place the pork shoulder into the slow cooker, tip in the fajita seasoning, chicken stock, orange and lime juice and place the garlic cloves into the sauce.

Cook on low for 6 hours then remove the pork from the slow cooker and shred with 2 forks. Squish the garlic cloves out of their skin and place with the pulled pork in a bowl. Add just enough of the sauce to keep it moist.
Heat the tortillas and serve with the pork carnitas and your favourite taco toppings.
